title: OpenApi: Config quarkus.smallrye-openapi.additional-docs-directory casues error if directory does not exist
body:
### Describe the bug

Configure `quarkus.smallrye-openapi.additional-docs-directory` to point to a directory which does not exist (e.g. `META-INF/foldernamethatdoesnotexist` .
Then run Quarkus in dev mode or try running a @QuarkusTest with `mvn clean test`.

### Expected behavior

Quarkus should ignore the missing directory and not load any additional docs.

### Actual behavior

Quarkus throws an exception:

java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
        [error]: Build step io.quarkus.smallrye.openapi.deployment.SmallRyeOpenApiProcessor#configFiles threw an exception: java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException: C:\dev\repo\...\target\classes\META-INF\openapi
        at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$2.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:896)
        at io.quarkus.builder.BuildContext.run(BuildContext.java:277)
        at org.jboss.threads.ContextHandler$1.runWith(ContextHandler.java:18)
        at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$Task.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:2449)
        at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$ThreadBody.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:1478)
        at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:833)
        at org.jboss.threads.JBossThread.run(JBossThread.java:501)
Caused by: java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException: C:\dev\repo\...\target\classes\META-INF\openapi
        at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsException.translateToIOException(WindowsException.java:85)
        at java.base/sun.nio.fs.WindowsException.rethrowAsIOException(WindowsException.java:103)


### How to Reproduce?

Set the given config property to point to a directory that does not exists and try to build/test the Quarkus project.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.1" 2021-10-19 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Microsoft-28056 (build 17.0.1+12-LTS)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.3 (ff8e977a158738155dc465c6a97ffaf31982d739)

### Additional information

_No response_
